title: Blueberry and apple compote
time: Takes 20 minutes to make, plus chilling and cooling
description: This blueberry and apple compote is simple to make and is great with yogurt for breakfast.
ingredients: 500g cooking apples, peeled, cored and chopped

method.Step 1: Put all the ingredients into a large bowl with 4 tablespoons of water. Microwave on high for 4 minutes and stir. Return to the microwave and cook for 3 more minutes until the fruit is tender. Cool and chill, then eat with yogurt.
